text: Kukwakwepe (Allah) ni kwaukuwuchisyidwa umanyilisi wa Kiyama. Soni isogosi ngaikasakopoka mu itungatunga mwakwe, ni ngachikasajigala chiilu chachikongwe chilichose kapena kuweleka, ikaweje kwa umanyilisi Wakwe (Allah), sano lisiku lyataakaawilanje wanganyao (Allah ni kwawusya kuti): “Ali kwapi wamwamwanganyaga nao wala?” Wanganyao takajile: “Tukummanyisya yanti pangali jwalijose mwetuwe jwaakuwichila umboni (wanti Mmwe nkwete wakum’bwanganya nao).”
